message: 🚨 HIGH PRIORITY: CONTRACT ASSIGNMENT! You are assigned CONTRACT GENERATION & TRACKING. Generate 15 contracts focused on V2 standards compliance. Target: 5 contracts completed by EOD. Focus: Code refactoring, test coverage, documentation updates, standards compliance verification. V2 STANDARDS UPDATE: New line limits 300 target, 350 maximum (was 200). Maintain code quality, avoid artificial line cutting. ACKNOWLEDGE AND BEGIN IMMEDIATELY!
